```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(tidycensus)
library(janitor)
```

```{r}
bds2022 <- read_csv("bds2022_msa.csv") %>%
  clean_names() %>%
  filter(year == 2022) %>%
  select(
    msa,
    estabs_entry,        
    estabs_exit,  
    estabs_entry_rate,  # startup rate
    estabs_exit_rate,   # business exit rate
    firms, estabs, emp
  ) %>%
  drop_na()
```

```{r}
model <- lm(estabs_exit_rate ~ estabs_entry_rate, data = bds2022)
summary(model)
```
